helpText: æ_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________Â.

generic.title: æ_Error updating categories__________________________Â
generic.message: æ_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________Â.

maxDepthExceeded.title: æ_Error updating categories__________________________Â
maxDepthExceeded.message: æ_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________Â.

destinationHasSameName.title: æ_Error updating categories__________________________Â
destinationHasSameName.message: æ_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________Â.

noSchema.title: æ_Schema not found_________________Â
noSchema.message: æ_Item schema not found for user_________________Â.

maxCharacter.title: æ_Error updating categories__________________________Â
maxCharacter.message: æ_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________Â.

deleteInUseCategory.title: æ_Delete category________________Â
deleteInUseCategory.message: æ_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________Â.

custom.title: æ_Custom categories__________________Â
custom.message: æ_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________Â.

arcgis.title: æ_ArcGIS categories__________________Â
arcgis.message: æ_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________Â.

iso.title: æ_ISO categories_______________Â
iso.message: æ_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________Â.

inspire.title: æ_INSPIRE categories___________________Â
inspire.message: æ_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________Â.
